movie.overview: After his classmate and crush is diagnosed with a pancreatic disease, an average high schooler sets out to make the most of her final days.
movie.tagline: This is a story about an unforgettable spring...
movie.title: I Want to Eat Your Pancreas

cast.name: Kazuya Saji
cast.character: Father of the Boy and Girl (voice)

cast.name: Anju Nitta
cast.character: Man from the Dried Food Store (voice)

cast.name: Junnosuke Kuroda
cast.character: Old Man from the Fish Shop (voice)

results.overview: A woman suffering from terminal cancer struggles to resolve several relationships in her life: a devoted but stressed lover, an estranged sister, and a daughter on the edge of a nervous breakdown.
results.title: Pilgrim, Farewell

results.original_title: デジモンアドベンチャー tri. 第5章「共生」
results.overview: Meicoomon rampages after witnessing Meiko Mochizuki being injured by the man bearing Gennai's likeness. "It would have been better if you hadn't been born..." Meicoomon disappears into the Real World, which has since become distorted. Possessing overwhelming power, she's the key to the world's destruction.
results.title: Digimon Adventure tri. Part 5: Coexistence

results.original_title: 結城友奈は勇者である -鷲尾須美の章- 第3章 「やくそく」
results.overview: In the year 298 of the Divine Era, elementary school girls Washio Sumi, Nogi Sonoko, and Minowa Gin are tasked with an important mission. They are to become heroes and fight Vertex, a mysterious enemy that is attacking Shinju-sama, the god tree that protects Shikoku, the only area in the world that is still habitable. What they don't know, is that this fight will cost them more than they could have ever imagined.
results.title: Yuuki Yuuna is a Hero: Washio Sumi's Chapter 3 - Promise

results.original_title: ハイキュー!! 才能とセンス
results.overview: A compilation film depicting the match against Aoba Johsai High School in the second season of the anime series. It will also include new scenes portraying what happened after the match.
results.title: Haikyu!! The Movie: Talent and Sense

results.original_title: ハイキュー!! コンセプトの戦い
results.overview: A recap film depicting the match against Shiratorizawa Academy in the third season of the anime series.
results.title: Haikyu!! The Movie: Battle of Concepts

results.overview: Two sisters return home after a stay in a mental institution, only to face disturbing events and a strained relationship with their stepmother. As eerie occurrences unfold, dark family secrets begin to surface, blurring the line between reality and nightmare.
results.title: A Tale of Two Sisters

results.overview: John, an ambitious but undisciplined New York City office worker, meets and marries Mary. They start a family, struggle to cope with marital stress, financial setbacks, and tragedy, all while lost amid the anonymous, pitiless throngs of the big city.
results.title: The Crowd

results.overview: A moving and memorable family drama about a terminally ill writer who wants to be reconciled with his long-abandoned son.
results.title: That Good Night

results.original_title: 楽園追放 心のレゾナンス
results.overview: Anime movie sequel of Expelled from Paradise.
results.title: Liberated from Paradise: Resonance of the Heart

results.original_title: DEEMO サクラノオト -あなたの奏でた音が、今も響く-
results.overview: Deemo is a lonely individual who lives in solitude, playing the piano in a castle. One day, a girl who has lost her memory falls from the sky. Wanting to help her recover her memories and return to her world, Deemo discovers that a tree kept atop the piano will grow whenever the piano is played.
results.title: DEEMO Memorial Keys

results.original_title: メロエッタのキラキラリサイタル
results.overview: Pikachu and its Pokémon friends gather for a very special event: the Mythical Pokémon Meloetta is giving a once-a-year performance at Lunatone Rock! As the full moon rises, the Melody Tree sprouts up from the stage, growing the Melody Berries that enhance Meloetta’s song. But when a battle breaks out in the audience, the Melody Berries are scattered far and wide! Can Pikachu and the others track down these special Berries so Meloetta’s show can go on—and can they find them before Meowth does?
results.title: Meloetta's Moonlight Serenade

results.overview: The all female crew of the transport ship Muse is on a mission in deep space. They pick up an SOS signal and discover a derelict space cruiser where all the women have died mysteriously. They take the only survivor, a young woman named Flair, and detonate the ghost ship. However, the danger is just beginning. With Flair on the Muse, the romances between the women begin to take a new turn. One by one, the crewmembers are attacked by a mysterious alien presence, desperate to find a way to reproduce with human women!
results.title: Alien from the Darkness

results.overview: Advertising executive Nick Marshall is as cocky as they come, but what happens to a chauvinistic guy when he can suddenly hear what women are thinking? Nick gets passed over for a promotion, but after an accident enables him to hear women's thoughts, he puts his newfound talent to work against Darcy, his new boss, who seems to be infatuated with him.
results.title: What Women Want

results.overview: Cencoroll 3 is the finale to the main characters Tetsu and Yuki's story.
results.title: Cencoroll 3

results.overview: As children in the loving Ekdahl family, Fanny and Alexander enjoy a happy life with their parents, who run a theater company. After their father dies unexpectedly, however, the siblings end up in a joyless home when their mother, Emilie, marries a stern bishop. The bleak situation gradually grows worse as the bishop becomes more controlling, but dedicated relatives make a valiant attempt to aid Emilie, Fanny and Alexander.
results.title: Fanny and Alexander

results.overview: Reuben Feffer is a guy who's spent his entire life playing it safe. Polly Prince is irresistible as a free-spirit who lives for the thrill of the moment. When these two comically mismatched souls collide, Reuben's world is turned upside down, as he makes an uproarious attempt to change his life from middle-of-the-road to totally-out-there.
results.title: Along Came Polly

results.overview: Romeo Montague and Juliet Capulet fall in love against the wishes of their feuding families. Driven by their passion, the young lovers defy their destiny and elope, only to suffer the ultimate tragedy.
results.title: Romeo and Juliet

results.original_title: ひみつのアッコちゃん
results.overview: Taisho's father plans to construct an apartment building on a vacant land he owns behind his own house. The spot is a playing field for the kids in the neighborhood who will fight to keep it as it is. Akko, being a friend to those in need, uses the powers of her magical compact to investigate and sway the decision to keep the kids happy.
results.title: Akko-chan's Got a Secret!

results.original_title: ひみつのアッコちゃん 海だ! おばけだ!! 夏祭り
results.overview: Akko and her friends are on summer vacation, and what could be more of a summer event than a beach trip? A festival is occurring around the beach, and while everyone is enjoying the festivities, Taisho and his gang head to a supposedly cursed island. Does Akko have anything to do with it?
results.title: Akko-chan's Got a Secret! – The Sea! The Specters!! The Summer Festival

results.overview: The Nazis, exasperated at the number of escapes from their prison camps by a relatively small number of Allied prisoners, relocate them to a high-security 'escape-proof' camp to sit out the remainder of the war. Undaunted, the prisoners plan one of the most ambitious escape attempts of World War II. Based on a true story.
results.title: The Great Escape
